org.jcvlib.image

Class Geom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.image.Geom

  • public class Geom
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a base class for geometry transformations.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • wrapPerspectiveTransform

        public static Image wrapPerspectiveTransform(Image image,
                             Jama.Matrix P,
                             Size newSize,
                             int interpolationType,
                             Color fillColor)
        Wrap perspective transformation matrix to image.

        Apply perspective transformation represented as a matrix: 

         
 | ti * x'i|   | p11  p12  p13 |   | xi |
 | ti * y'i| = | p21  p22  p23 | * | yi |
 | ti      |   | p31  p32  p33 |   | 1  |

        Links:
        1. Perspective Transform Estimation.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        P - Perspective matrix with added offset vector (with size [3x3]).
        newSize - Size of result image.
        interpolationType - Type of interpolation. Use Geom.INTERPOLATION_* parameters.
        fillColor - Color to fill field near the image.
        Returns:
        Result of image transformation.

      • getPerspectiveTransfrom

        public static Jama.Matrix getPerspectiveTransfrom(java.util.List<Point> srcPoint,
                                  java.util.List<Point> dstPoint)
        Calculate perspective transformation matrix from 4 pairs of the corresponding points.

        Links:
        1. Perspective Transform Estimation.

        Parameters:
        srcPoint - 4 source points.
        dstPoint - 4 target points.
        Returns:
        Matrix that apply transformation image.

      • wrapAffineTransform

        public static Image wrapAffineTransform(Image image,
                        Jama.Matrix A,
                        Size newSize,
                        int interpolationType,
                        Color fillColor)
        Wrap affine transformation matrix to image.

        Apply perspective transformation represented as a matrix: 

         
 | x'i|   | a11  a12  a13 |   | xi |
 | y'i| = | a21  a22  a23 | * | yi |
                             | 1  |

        Links:
        1. Affine transformation -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        A - Affine matrix with added offset vector (with size [2x3]).
        newSize - Size of result image.
        interpolationType - Type of interpolation. Use Geom.INTERPOLATION_* parameters.
        fillColor - Color to fill field near the image.
        Returns:
        Result of image transformation.

      • getAffineTransfrom

        public static Jama.Matrix getAffineTransfrom(java.util.List<Point> srcPoint,
                             java.util.List<Point> dstPoint)
        Calculate affine transformation matrix from 3 pairs of the corresponding points.

        Links:
        1. Affine transformation -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        srcPoint - 3 source points.
        dstPoint - 3 target points.
        Returns:
        Matrix that apply transformation image.

      • reflect

        public static Image reflect(Image image,
            int reflectType)
        Reflect image according to selected type.

        Links:
        1. Mirror image -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        reflectType - Type of reflection. Use Geom.REFLECT_* parameters.
        Returns:
        Image with same size, number of channels and type as source image.

      • scale

        public static Image scale(Image image,
          double scale,
          int interpolationType,
          Color fillColor)
        Scale image.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        scale - Scale parameter.
        interpolationType - Type of interpolation. Use Geom.INTERPOLATION_* parameters.
        fillColor - Color to fill field near the image.
        Returns:
        Image with new size and same number of channels and same type as source image.

      • scale

        public static Image scale(Image image,
          double scale)
        Scale image.

        Use Image.INTERPOLATION_BILINEAR and Color.COLOR_MIN_VALUE as default.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        scale - Scale parameter.
        Returns:
        Image with new size and same number of channels and same type as source image.

        public static Image resize(Image image,
           Size newSize,
           int interpolationType,
           Color fillColor)
        Resize image.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        newSize - New image size.
        interpolationType - Type of interpolation. Use Geometry.INTERPOLATION_* parameters.
        fillColor - Color to fill field near the image.
        Returns:
        Image with new size and same number of channels and same type as source image.

      • resize

        public static Image resize(Image image,
           Size newSize)
        Resize image.

        Use Image.INTERPOLATION_BILINEAR and Color.COLOR_MIN_VALUE as default.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        newSize - New image size.
        Returns:
        Image with new size and same number of channels and same type as source image.

      • rotate

        public static Image rotate(Image image,
           double angle,
           Point centerOfRotation,
           int interpolationType,
           Color fillColor)
        Rotate image on some degree.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        angle - Rotation angle in degrees.
        centerOfRotation - Center of rotation.
        interpolationType - Type of interpolation. Use Geometry.INTERPOLATION_* parameters.
        fillColor - Color to fill field near the image.
        Returns:
        Rotated image.

      • rotate

        public static Image rotate(Image image,
           double angle)
        Rotate image on some degree.

        Use center of image as center of rotation, Image.INTERPOLATION_BILINEAR and Color.COLOR_MIN_VALUE as default.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        angle - Rotation angle in degrees.
        Returns:
        Rotated image.
